---
title: "Site Performance Dashboards"
---

## Why Dashboards Matter
Dashboards convert raw data into:
- Situational awareness
- Prioritization
- Decision support

## Common Dashboard Elements
- Enrollment vs target
- Query volume over time
- Deviation trends
- SAE counts
- Visit compliance

## CRA Use Cases
- Weekly study team calls
- Site performance reviews
- Escalation justification
- Monitoring planning
